title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
description: Learn cutting-edge strategies in SEO, social media marketing, and content creation from industry experts. Includes hands-on workshops and networking sessions.

title: Summer Rock Concert
description: A high-energy rock show featuring three local bands and a headlining international act. Full bar and VIP lounge available.

title: Photography Workshop Series
description: A 4-week course covering portrait, landscape, and street photography. Includes outdoor shoots and post-processing techniques.

title: Science Fair for Kids
description: Interactive science experiments and demonstrations for children ages 6-12. Learn about physics, chemistry, and robotics through fun activities.

title: Marathon Run Challenge
description: Annual city marathon with routes for 5K, 10K, and full marathon runners. Includes medals, refreshments, and live entertainment at the finish line.
